catalog_script_client.name: Live-OB: Populate org

sys_update_version.name: catalog_script_client_5f069dc11b6aac905e72ebd5604bcb9b
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item/><cat_variable>IO:7c5515811b6aac905e72ebd5604bcba7</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Live-OB:  Populate org</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
   var tower_organisation = g_form.getReference('ansible_tower_organisation_lookup',update_form);
}

function update_form(tower_organisation){
	g_form.setValue('organisation_name',tower_organisation.name);
	g_form.setReadOnly('organisation_name', true);
	g_form.setValue('organisation_description',tower_organisation.description);
	g_form.setValue('organisation_business_owner',tower_organisation.business_owner);
	g_form.setValue('organisation_technical_owner',tower_organisation.technical_owner);

	
    //g_form.setValue('organisation_admins', tower_organisation.admins );
    //g_form.setReadOnly('organisation_admins', true);
    //g_form.setValue('organisation_members',tower_organisation.members );
    //g_form.setReadOnly('organisation_members', true);
    g_form.setValue('organisation_admins','SSC-AWX-ALL-ORGADMIN-' + tower_organisation.name );
    g_form.setReadOnly('organisation_admins', true);
    g_form.setValue('organisation_members','SSC-AWX-ALL-ORG-' + tower_organisation.name );
    g_form.setReadOnly('organisation_members', true);
	
    g_form.setVisible('ansible_tower_organisation', true);
    g_form.setVisible('corresponding_business_service', false);
	g_form.setVisible('ansible_tower_use_case_lookup', true);
   sessionStorage.setItem("org_name", ""+g_form.getValue('organisation_name'));
}

	
	
	]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>e663988</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-02-23 18:48:59</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>5f069dc11b6aac905e72ebd5604bcb9b</sys_id><sys_mod_count>11</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Live-OB:  Populate org</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="GTS_OAR_Ansible_Tower" source="x_ibmss_gts_oar_at">0cf0becddb143300c66571198c961991</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="GTS_OAR_Ansible_Tower">0cf0becddb143300c66571198c961991</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_5f069dc11b6aac905e72ebd5604bcb9b</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>e663988</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-02-24 13:00:45</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
